Text: French slangDear Student Attached please find your lesson You can open the attached Lesson as you would any other attachment by downloading the attached file to one of your directories and then opening it in a browser If you need additional help in opening this attachment please go to parlohelpfaqemailenasp for more instructions If you would like to receive Parlos Lessons in html please go to the My Parlo section of our website at parlohomemyparlomyparloenasp and change your preference to an html formatted lesson in our subscription center Thanks and we hope you enjoy todays lesson To view your lesson online Please click here parloemailsFRENindexasp or copy and paste the above url into your browser parlohtm
